name: 8 Links
description:
8 Links is a cool & smooth puzzle where your goal is to link tiles. Make the longest chain, score more points and complete all the achievements

How to play:

- tap the squares to place tiles

- try to link as much tiles as you can

- once the bank button is filled up, press it to gain points

- use the crunch to delete a tile if you are blocked

If you have a feed back : antonmakesgames@gmail.com
